trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemDataBound"></xref> events of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemDataBound"> </xref> eventos de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The MenuEventArgs class is used to store the event data passed to an event handler for the events in the following table.
trans-unit.target: A classe de MenuEventArgs é utilizada para armazenar os dados de eventos transmitidos para um processador de eventos para os eventos na seguinte tabela.

trans-unit.source: |Event|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick>|Occurs when a menu item is clicked.
trans-unit.target: | Evento | Descrição | |-----------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick>| Ocorre quando um item de menu é clicado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick>

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used to synchronize a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control with another control on the page.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemDataBound>|Occurs when a menu item is bound to data.
trans-unit.target: Este evento é normalmente utilizado para sincronizar um controlo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>com outro controlo na página. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemDataBound>| Ocorre quando um item de menu está vinculado a dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemDataBound> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used to modify a menu item before it is rendered in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.| Depending on the event raised, you can access the menu item clicked by the user or the menu item being bound to data by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs.Item%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Este evento é normalmente utilizado para modificar um item de menu antes de este é composto num controlo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>. | Consoante o evento é desencadeado, pode aceder a utilizador clicado com o utilizador ou o item de menu que está a ser vinculado a dados utilizando o item de menu o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs.Item%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs.Item%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the MenuEventArgs class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância da classe MenuEventArgs, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs"></xref> class using the specified menu item.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs"> </xref> classe utilizando o item de menu especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs> class from the specified menu item.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este construtor para criar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs>classe do item de menu especificado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte mostra os valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>|<xref:System.String.Empty>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs.Item%2A>|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object specified by the `item` parameter.|
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor inicial | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>| `null`| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>| <xref:System.String.Empty>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>| `null`| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs.Item%2A>| O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>o objeto especificado pelo `item` parâmetro. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs.Item%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> </xref:System.String.Empty> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>

trans-unit.source: For the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick"></xref> event, this parameter represents the menu item clicked by the user.
trans-unit.target: Para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick"> </xref> evento, este parâmetro representa o item de menu clicado pelo utilizador.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemDataBound"></xref> event, this parameter represents the menu item being bound to data.
trans-unit.target: Para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemDataBound"> </xref> evento, este parâmetro representa o item de menu que está a ser vinculado a dados.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs"></xref> class using the specified menu item, command source, and event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs"> </xref> classe com o item de menu especificado, a origem de comando e os argumentos de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs> class from the specified menu item, command source, and event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este construtor para criar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs>classe do item de menu especificado, a origem de comando e os argumentos de eventos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte mostra os valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>|The value of the `originalArgs.CommandArgument` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>|The value of the `originalArgs.CommandName` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>|The <xref:System.Object> specified by the `commandSource` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs.Item%2A>|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object specified by the `item` parameter.|
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor inicial | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>| O valor da `originalArgs.CommandArgument` parâmetro. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>| O valor da `originalArgs.CommandName` parâmetro. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>| O <xref:System.Object>especificado pelo `commandSource` parâmetro. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs.Item%2A>| O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>o objeto especificado pelo `item` parâmetro. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs.Item%2A> </xref:System.Object> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>

trans-unit.source: For the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick"></xref> event, this parameter represents the menu item clicked by the user.
trans-unit.target: Para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick"> </xref> evento, este parâmetro representa o item de menu clicado pelo utilizador.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemDataBound"></xref> event, this parameter represents the menu item being bound to data.
trans-unit.target: Para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemDataBound"> </xref> evento, este parâmetro representa o item de menu que está a ser vinculado a dados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>gerado que o evento.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"></xref> that contains the command name and command argument values for the menu item.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"> </xref> que contém o nome do comando e os valores de argumento de comando para o item de menu.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Object> that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref:System.Object>gerado que o evento.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Use the CommandSource property to access the <xref:System.Object> that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade de CommandSource para aceder a <xref:System.Object>gerado que o evento.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>gerado que o evento.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets the menu item associated with the event raised.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o item de menu associado com o evento é desencadeado.

trans-unit.source: Use the Item property to access or modify the properties of the menu item associated with the event raised.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade do Item para aceder ou modificar as propriedades do item de menu associada com o evento é desencadeado.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick> event, this item represents the menu item clicked by the user.
trans-unit.target: Para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick>evento, este item representa o item de menu clicado pelo utilizador.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick>

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemDataBound> event, this item represents the menu item being bound to data.
trans-unit.target: Para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemDataBound>evento, este item representa o item de menu que está a ser vinculado a dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemDataBound>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem"></xref> that represents the menu item associated with the event raised.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem"> </xref> que representa o item de menu associado com o evento é desencadeado.
